entry.title: Russia Launches Missile Volley Across Ukraine
entry.content: Moscow unleashed a fresh barrage of missiles across Ukraine, with strikes on critical infrastructure cutting off water supplies in the capital and causing power outages in the west of the country, authorities said.

entry.title: Much of China Locks Down With No End to Zero Covid in Sight
entry.content: Beijing shopping and office districts were nearly deserted as millions of people across the country remained under lockdown, and the number of cases across the mainland appeared set to surpass the previous peak of almost 29,000.

entry.title: The World's Biggest Airports Confront a Tiny but Serious Safety Threat---Wasps
entry.content: Every week, workers at one of Australia’s major airports spend hours searching the tarmac and terminals for a security threat that could bring down an airplane.

entry.title: Confronting Iran Protests, Regime Uses Brute Force but Secretly Appeals to Moderates
entry.content: The unrest poses a serious challenge to the clerical regime’s rule. Purges of rivals and reformists from the government have narrowed officials’ options for a response.
